html: voice like a trumpet. Alma longed to speak with a voice like a trumpet, in loudness and clarity, when he cried out, "O that I were an angel,…that I might go forth and speak with the trump of God, with a voice to shake the earth…. Yea, I would declare unto every soul, as with the voice of thunder, repentance and the plan of redemption, that they should repent and come unto our God, that there might not be more sorrow upon all the face of the earth" (Alma 29:1-2).
